channel.title: g-api on seteuid0's blog
channel.description: Recent content in g-api on seteuid0's blog

item.title: devstack安装 g-api did not start
item.description: 使用ubuntu12.4+devstack来实验openstack,出现了g-api did no start,找了下资料，通过一下方式解决。只要修改 /etc/default/locale LANG=“POSIX"详情见：https://bugs.launchpad.net/devstack/+bug/1119428
